arm_group.description: Participants in this group will use the hand-written diary for the first two week and switch to Kinesia HomeView and the electronic diary for the second two weeks.
Participants in this group will use Kinesia HomeView and the electronic diary for the first two week and switch to the hand-written diary for the second two weeks.

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective is to compare the sensitivity and test-retest reliability of Kinesia HomeView
      to electronic and hand-written diaries for tracking medication state in the home.
      Demonstrating comparable or superior results will further support use of the Kinesia
      HomeView system as an outcome measure in clinical drug trials.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Clinical diagnosis of Parkinson's disease

          -  On a stable antiparkinsonian medication regimen that includes levodopa for at least 4
             weeks

          -  Experiencing dyskinesia more than 25% of the waking day (score ≥ 2 on Unified
             Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale item 32)

          -  With dyskinesias at least moderately disabling (score ≥ 2 on Unified Parkinson's
             Disease Rating Scale item 33)

          -  Capable of accurately completing diaries

          -  Capable of accurately using Kinesia HomeView

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Significant medical or psychiatric illness

          -  Subjects not capable of following the required clinical instructions

          -  Serious medical conditions that would compromise safety

intervention.description: Motion sensor based telemedicine system for assessment of movement disorder motor symptoms in the home. Includes automated motor assessment using motion sensor and electronic dyskinesia diary.
Hand-written paper diary indicating state (Off, On without dyskinesias, on with non-troublesome dyskinesias, on with troublesome dyskinesias) at 30 minute intervals.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.description: Test-retest reliability will be compared between Kinesia HomeView measures, hand-written diary entries, and electronic diary entries.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaires on the usability of Kinesia HomeView will be completed following the 4-week data collection period.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic
